name: Coach to Transformation
description: We are a Global Coaching Company started in India. We serve our clients across the globe today with the help of our presence in 11 countries. We have a highly experienced core team (all credentialed coaches), a powerful network of International Coach Federation (ICF) certified coaches across the globe, and technology solutions to address an organization’s coaching and coach training requirements. We serve large corporate clients and also individuals from all walks of life, from CXO s to first-time managers. We contribute to society by offering pro-Bono coaching to students and the social sector.
features: Highly experienced and certified mentor coaches
Continuous learning support during and post training
Global cohorts of CXO, Business, HR and IT leade
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: A Global Leadership Coaching Company
ShortDescription: We are a Global Coaching Company started in India. We serve our clients across the globe today with the help of our presence in 11 countries.
enhanced_description: Coach to Transformation is a global leadership coaching company, founded in India in 2014, with an operational presence across 11 countries. The company provides comprehensive coaching and coach training solutions leveraging advanced technology, including elements of Training eLearning software, Learning Experience Systems (LXPs), and Artificial Intelligence. Their services are designed to accelerate skill development and enhance learning efficiency for a diverse client base, ranging from large corporate clients, including global cohorts of CXOs, Business, HR, and IT leaders, to first-time managers and individuals across all walks of life. The organization prides itself on a highly experienced core team of credentialed coaches and an extensive global network of International Coach Federation (ICF) certified coaches, offering continuous learning support both during and post-training. Additionally, Coach to Transformation contributes to society through pro-Bono coaching for students and the social sector.
competitive_advantages: Highly experienced and credentialed core coaching team
Extensive network of ICF certified coaches globally
compliance_features: Adherence to International Coach Federation (ICF) standards
scalability_features: Capacity to serve large enterprise clients globally
